root.name: My Spanish Coach
root.description: When you first create a profile in My Spanish Coach you are asked to take a two minute long quiz so that My Spanish Coach can get a feel of you knowledge of Spanish vocabulary and it assigns you a current level of knowledge of the language. After that you will be given lessons to learn about subjects you don't know and then will be quizzed about them. The game is meant to be a helpful tool to teach you Spanish but in order to learn the language you will need another learning source.
